name: Once Upon a Slime (ZeRobinZe)
description:
What is Once Upon a Slime?

Once Upon a Slime is a short third person action adventure game. It is also created for a small group student project. In OUaS, you play as a slime named Slimey, and defeat the slime king in this short adventure.
